description: A link to the parent task.
name: task_id

description: A pos-int number of products for receiving.
name: qty

description: An actual pos-int number of received products.
name: qty_decanted

description: An actual pos-int number of received products.
name: units

description: Product ID in the retailer's system.
name: corp_id

description:
Additional field, barcode of the product without check digit. EAN-8/UPC-E should be expanded into UPC-A format. 020-029 prefixed UPCs should be ending with "00000" (do not contain any price/weight information). 

UPC is usually set when "supplier type=Orderable DSD" or "supplier type=DSD"
name: upc

description: Description of shipment unit (EACH , PACK, BOX etc).
name: ship_unit_description

description: Quantity of product units in shipment unit.
name: quantity_in_ship_unit

description: Price of product unit or of ship unit.
name: purchase_price
__pubsub_message_id
description: ID of the message assigned by PubSub
